description.value:
Favored Weapon @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Dagger]{Dagger}

The Hellknight signifers of the Order of the Gate seek to prevent lawlessness of all types through the use of their considerable spellcasting prowess and command of fiendish outsiders.

Lesser Benefit @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Locate Lawbreakers]{Locate Lawbreakers}

Greater Benefit @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Devil Allies]{Devil Allies}
